game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the long-lost artifact is hidden in a cave deep in the forest. The village elder needs your help to retrieve it and bring peace back to the community.

task.objective: Explore the forest and locate the cave entrance.
task.description: Follow the river that flows through the heart of the forest until you find a dark opening in the rocks.

task.objective: Enter the cave and navigate the dangers inside.
task.description: Beware of traps and creatures that lurk in the shadows. Find a way to safely make your way to the artifact.
